Articles.Content:
I may not have a space suit, but I am in a space ship so I don't need one.

The next poster falls for the oldest trick in the book.

that is give money. also I did not fall for it me from th3e future told me when to stop sending the money back to get doubled.

next poster is hit by a planet buster

Planet buster, not human butster.

The PB sails past me, fragments for no reason, and fragments hit the next poster.

I have a fragment proof vest!

I throw a pie at the next poster.

I duck and throw a splash of liquid containing ebola, malaria, and about a dozen other deadly diseases onto the pie as it passes overhead

Turns out the next poster is standing right behind me.

But I was the one who threw the pie... Whatever, who needs logic? There is luckily a brick wall between me and the pie.

The next poster meets the kraken.
I am secretly danny, and I sacrifice some kerbals to it

You didn't attack me, so I survive.

I send an army of ninjas to kill the next poster.
my kraken sacrifice sends the kraken on your ninjas

Again, you didn't attack me...

I drop $1,000,000 in pennies on the next poster.

NOT IF I HAVE A UMBRELLA

next poter is snetanced to death by oxygen

Edited November 27, 2014 by megatiger78

I see you watch Eddsworld. I breathe oxygen, so I am fine.

I park my car on the next poster's sandwich.

I slide underneath the car, snatching my sandwich up in the nick of time.

I then order Exterminatus upon the next posters home-world.

I am on Duma at the time.

I crash a moon into the next poster.

eh.. teleporter.

next poster annihilalzored.

I have an anti-annihilazor shield.

The annihilalzors are redirected at the next poster.

They missed me.

I shoot the next poster in the face with an RPG.

I have a active protection system activated

I send some democracy to the next user
The Republic Commandos land on the "democracy" and take it over to bomb the next poster then kamikaze and jump out before.

I disarm the bomb by cutting the red wire.

The next poster cuts the blue wire.

Since the bomb is already defused, I jump back away from the bomb.

I then empty an entire needler magazine in the direction of the next poster.
I doge then said commandos empty 4 DC-17 clips into the next poster

I Googled 4 DC-17 and I had results ranging from camera lenzes to dog collars. Considering the whole "strapped on" thing, I am guessing that it's an electric dog collar. I use scissors to remove it.

The next poster finds himself falling into a black hole (above the event horizon).

I simply teleport away, to the next poster's room.

I then use my Venus superpowers to flood the room in sulfuric acid, supercritical CO2, and intense pressures and temperatures, all without harming myself.

I send 4 RCs (Republic Commandos, who incidentally Use a DC-17 blaster rifle.) to stop you.

they then proceed to kill the next poster
